name: Ethics and the Public Sphere
description: A seminar course that explores ethical issues arising in such public domains as international relations, law, science, business, the arts, civil society, public life, the mass media, popular culture. Issues may include war crimes, human rights, assisted suicide, genetic engineering, corporate responsibility, private vice and public virtue, the tragedy of the commons. Open only to students admitted to Trinity One. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
exclusions: Innis One, Munk One, New One, St. Mike's One, Vic One, UC One, Woodsworth One
